kimi-k2.5.description: Open-source native multimodal agentic model with vision and language understanding, supporting instant and thinking modes with 256K context.

qwen.description: Next-gen 400B multimodal MoE model with advanced vision, chat, RAG, and agentic capabilities.

deepseek-v3.2.description: State-of-the-art 685B reasoning LLM with sparse attention, long context, and integrated agentic tools.

glm4.7.description: Multilingual agentic coding partner with stronger reasoning, tool use, and UI skills.
